title: How long would it take to bleed out if you cut your hepatic artery? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is hard to say as the extent of the cut and the circumstances involved. Are you unconscious and have fallen in such a way as to tamponade the cut and reduce the bleeding. Therefore no real definitive answer is possible. Major arteries are just that major arteries… cut or severed completely in accident or injury could not be surprising to see a bled out in minutes. Roughly in about 6 minutes. Once 40% of your blood supply is lost there is the possibility of an irreversible volumetric/hemorrhagic shock. These injuries are very significant and usually the cause of death in most gunshot wounds to the body or even the upper thigh.
